Articles.Content:
Name: Jebediah Kerman 

Occupication: Kerbonaut (ID #001) 

Description: Jeb is the "face" of KSP, and a certified badS. He loves to fly experimental spacecraft, and is something of an adrenaline junkie. However, he is the best pilot in the Kerbol system.

Name: Bill Kerman

Occupication: Kerbonaut (ID #002) 

Description: Bill is an engineer, and serves as the mediator between badS Jeb and rational Bob. He is the best engineer known to Kerbal, which is one of the reasons he was hired. He has a strong sense of loyalty.

Name: Bob Kerman 

Occupation: Kerbonaut (ID #003) 

Description: Bob is rational-minded, and is tired of Jeb's antics. He never understands the point of needless explosions, which Jeb views as a significant character flaw. He is a scientist, getting his KhD at Karvard and spending research time at KIT. He studied under the tutelage of Wernher Von Kerman, and was selected as a Kerbonaut due to his intelligence and problem-solving skills.

Name: Valentina Kerman 

Occupication: Kerbonaut (ID #004)

Description: Valentina has known Jeb, Bill, and Bob since sprouthood, and the four have been best friends since. She is as good a pilot as Jeb, and badS as well, but despite being fearless, is more rational then Jeb. She was selected as a Kerbonaut due to her piloting skills. She was the first female Kerbonaut in space and performed the first ever EVA [Yes, I know it was Leonov, but hey]

Name: Gene Kerman 

Occupication: Flight Director/Mission Controller 

Description: Gene is flight director for most missions, a team player, rational, and a problem-solver. He is famous for bringing Kerballo 13 home.

Name: Wernher von Kerman 

Occupication: Scientist (R&D head)

Description: Werhner is a scientist, and somewhat vain. He wears glasses and sports a large black mustache, and brags of being famous. However, he is extremely intelligent, and tutored Bob.

Names: Gus Kerman/ Linus Kerman/ Walt Kerman

Occupications: KSC staff

Description: These three are always seen together. They're important to the KSP, but don't get much attention. 

Name: Mortimer Kerman 

Occupication: Finances

Description: He's an old accountant. I suppose he's good at his job. He loves making things cheap. UNCOMFIRMED: May be slightly evil.

Forum colonists, you can ask for your bios to go here!

--Operation_Super_Colonization/Files/Personnel--

Edited March 21, 2016 by KAL 9000
Can you put mine up? Or should I put it in a comment?

These are really good, but I would build on Val a little more.  Are you familiar with her human counterpart: Valentina Tereshkova?   She was the first woman in space, and has an amazing history and biography.  Once I read about her, I changed my Val, and made her my primary BadS pilot.
I highly recommend looking her up, if you haven't already.... you'll be impressed, I promise!

Edited March 20, 2016 by Just Jim

On March 20, 2016 at 7:15 AM, RocketSquid said:

Can you put mine up? Or should I put it in a comment?

You can post it in a comment. After all, I don't know your personal biography (No real-life personal info required).

Okay, here goes:

Name: Ross Kerman (Ross from Rocket Squid)

Occupation: Kerbonaut (ID #006)

Description: Ross is raised on sci-fi and trained as a scientist. He laughs in the face of danger, likely due to knowing, or at least believing he knows, how to get out of tight situations. He dislikes the outdoors everywhere except Kerbin, since he dislikes spacesuits. He will, however, leave the base/ship/lander/rover/station if necessary or just really bored.

1 hour ago, RocketSquid said:

Great biography! Admittedly your custom Kerbal in the save file reads: name = RocketSquid Kerman

Great biography! Admittedly your custom Kerbal in the save file reads: name = RocketSquid Kerman

Thanks, you can just call "RocketSquid" the character's nickname.
